column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The only thing that bugs me about JINYA is the blaring music
column2: because I'm old and crotchety.  I can barely hear what the person across/besides me is saying sometimes
column4: makes for a rather somber meal of us stuffing our faces and smiling.  That might be an overall positive thing depending on how many raw cloves you've crushed into your bowl
